title: Roman Typeface
content: Is there any Roman typeface that had been influenced by the style of Asian typeface?
author: Siyang

comments.content: Roman font designed to harmonise with Arabic [http://www.boutrosfonts.com/end\_user.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233144/http:/www.boutrosfonts.com/end_user.asp "http://www.boutrosfonts.com/end\_user.asp")

Maybe if you can follow up with some specification, given the suggestions\* people already gave you, it's possible that you can find what you're looking for...  
\* here too: [http://typophile.com/node/62851](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233144/http:/typophile.com/node/62851 "http://typophile.com/node/62851")
